awd_titl_txt: Effects of High Pressure on the Kinetics of Grain-Growth    and Dislocation Recovery in Olivine and Modified Spinel
awd_abstract_narration: The goal of this project is to understand the effects of                   high pressure on grain-growth in fine-grained olivine and B-phase               aggregates and on dislocation recovery in olivine by the static                 annealing at high temperatures using the multiple anvil high                    pressure apparatus.  This study will yield the first data set on                the kinetics of grain-growth and dislocation recovery at very                   high pressure under well-controlled chemical environments.  The                 results have important applications in a wide range of geological               problems, including the evaluation of annealing effects in                      paleopiezometers, the evaluation of the effects of transformation               superplasticity, and the creep mechanisms and the mechanisms of                 dynamic recrystallization in these minerals.

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: REGENTS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF MINNESOTA
